name: Sweet Nandu
greetingText: You light up my worldðŸ’– my fireflyðŸ’—
wishText: One blink from you and my heart runs free, sounds like the perfect Valentine's don't you see? But my sassy girl may disagree, but i cant let go, just try and see. If there's a february and there's a 14th, it will always be incomplete.....without my lovebird besides me.
